page.title: 18COMMUNITY CENTRE
page.content: THE MOST POPULAR ACTIVITIES OUT OF ALTERNATIVE AGE GROUPS WERE: BADMINTON DISCOS , FOOTBALL & MANY USED THE CAFE FREQUENTLY. 9 OF THE 29 PEOPLE INTERVIEWED OWNED A MEMBERSHIP CARD. ALTHOUGH MANY PEOPLE ENJOY THE CENTRE THERE WERE A FEW COMPLAINTS. SOME SAID THE CENTRE WAS TOO STRICT. ALSO A FEW IMPROVEMENTS WERE ASKED FOR.THESE INCLUDED:{SQUASH COURTS,A {DRY SKI SLOPE,BROWNIES,TRAMPOLINES, {MORE DISCOS,MORE COMPUTERS & T.V.} THE SATURDAY DISCO FROM 1.00-3.0 0P.M. IS PARTICULARY POPULAR WITH PRIMARY SCHOOL CHILDREN. DURING THE SCHOOL SUMMER HOLIDAYS,A PLAY SCHEME IS HELD AT WHICH TRIPS, COMPUTERS,SNOOKER,POOL AND ARTS AND CRAFTS ARE ENJOYED.
